item.description:
Hi Team,

We are going to get together on Saturday April 21st from 9am-12ish at the Mashapaug Pond 361 Reservoir Ave, Providence (behind the Ocean State Job Lot). We will be moving the dock into the water and giving the CeCe a much needed cleaning. We'll need as many members as possible to help with moving the dock and the CeCe into the water.

If you've been receiving our e-mails, are curious about Dragonboat racing or just want to learn more about us. Please come on down anytime on Saturday. I'm sure there will be plenty of members who will be able to answer any questions you may have.

I look forward to seeing you there.

Carlos Costa

Director

Ocean State DragonBoat club
item.how_to_find_us: Behind the Ocean State Job Lot
item.name: Moving dock and Boat
